message.body: Hey Tanya, are you riding lucky this afternoon? 2?
Shoot Julia! With all the hectic going in right now I never got a chance to communicate with you! I wanted to ask what's happening with lucky today?? Is meg leading/riding him now? :)
I am not having lesson today but could jump on him if u need since it's last minute! ;)
Flight is 9am in Newark so we should probably leave house about 5:15 to park and ck in with enough time
And I'll probably get on lucky later, no problem! I hurt my dumb knee in yoga this week & am trying to get to the dr :/
Finally, I think that last text was for someone else, yeah??
So meg was gonna ride lucky with her parents there Tuesday, and I haven't heard anything since! I'll check in this weekend.
Bon voyage, have a great sunny time!
